Package classes

Class Collisions

java.lang.Object
classes.Collisions
public class Collisions extends Object
This class provides static methods for handling collisions in a game.

    • collide

      public static boolean collide(Player p, MapEntity e)
      Checks if a player collides with a map entity.
      Parameters:
      p - the player
      e - the map entity
      Returns:
      true if the player and the entity collide, false otherwise
